content: A-GFB Abrasive belts - SP Premium Premium abrasive file belts for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - ### FEATURES:Features Achieve most common metalwork surface finishes with our broad grade selection for rough to fine grinding Also available in coarse grain sizes for rougher grinding Developed for best results with Hilti variable-speed abrasive tools for professional metalwork Applications Rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals Obtaining linear medium and fine satin finishes on stainless steel, aluminum and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Length: 18 in Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel ### ITEMS- 2243008 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 9x457 P40 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243009 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 9x457 P60 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243150 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 9x457 P80 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243158 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 13x457 P60 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243159 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 13x457 P80 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243160 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 13x457 P120 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243153 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 30x457 P60 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243156 - Abrasive belt A-GFB 30x457 P80 SP - Package Size 20 pc
